uint32 ExpandItemReplyPacket::getItem (  uint32  i  )  const
 

Get one item in the reply.

Valid values for i is 0 <= i < getNbrItems().

Parameters:
i The cardinal number of the wanted item.
Returns:
ID of the i:th item. MAX_UINT32 is return upon error.
